Text: thank you.  you guys are great.
I thought the ABC Warriors was a great series when they were published.  Thanks.  (Big thanks for all the other comics too)
you're welcome howdyk. i never got into ABC personally, but it looks cool

dude!! it is awesome... some of  it is a bit weak, but thats due to ,you know changing writers and artists mid series!.. the best of it is fuckin' great. especially  all the kev walker ones plus volgan war vol 2 etc  which seems to have a tip o the hat other early brit comics  r.e panel and character composition.such as - revere the witch boy.. weird  one with cool art... have a quick look.
thanks for the recommendation wetbeak, i sat down and read this volume today and it's quite good. i will have to hunt down some more ABC storylines!
